ComicInfo.Title: Spider, Spider On The Moon!
ComicInfo.Summary: Spider, Spider On The Moon!: Adam Warlock stops the rocket carrying Spider-Man, and sends it to the moon. The Stranger tries to steal Adam's soul gem.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:48:14. [Issue ID 30857]
